connector.description: Load OpenAPI specification from URI and call an operation on the HTTP service. The request is generated respecting the rules given in the OpenAPI specification (e.g. path parameters, Content-Type).

camel.kamelet.rest-openapi-sink.specific.name: camel.kamelet.rest-openapi-sink.specification
camel.kamelet.rest-openapi-sink.specific.description: URI to the OpenApi specification file Example: https://api.example.com/openapi.json
